miic.core.stream.stack_stream¶

stack_stream(st)[source]¶

Calculate mean of all traces in stream

Calculate the mean of all overlapping segments of the trace in the input stream provided the traces match the sampling rate of the first trace.

Parameters:st (Stream) – The stream with the traces to be stacked
Return type:Stream
Returns:rst: Stream with stacked data in the first trace and number of stacked traces for each sample in the second trace
